CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.1.9.1a, patientdeathdateformat (3N) --> Value should be 102 AND B.1.9.1b, patientdeathdate (8N) --> convert to CCYYMMDD
E2B (R3): D.9.1 Date of Death Conformance: Optional Data Type: Date / Time OID: None Value Allowed: See Appendix II for further information nullFlavor: MSK, ASKU, NASK
CustomField.label: Date of Death
